comments:
Create an EAR Project.
Go to J2EE Module Dependencies page, click Add External Jar...
Select a ejb jar that is outside the workspace/project, e.g. C:/temp/myejb.jar
Run Clean.
Get the following in the log file.

Can this be reproduced in WTP 1.5?
Returning the defect, please read Comment #2

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP resolved bugs from the 1.0.x and 1.5.0 timeframe.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.
